rules_text:
Threshing Ghoul enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{W}: Threshing Ghoul gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“I lie awake most nights, haunted by the shrieks of lost souls. Is it simply thoughtless noise, or a labored expression of their existential pain?”
—Lady Silver of Spindlegarde[/i]
